name: bunny+bear
description:
A cute 2D platformer that has players try to reunite the fated bunny and bear as they travel through dark forest and desert.

Guide bunny through atmospheric environments in nature as they try to find their companion, bear, who has been lost, causing their separation.


                                                                                                        CREDITS
